General.Name: Singapore Technologies Engineering Ltd
General.Description: Singapore Technologies Engineering Ltd, an investment holding company, operates as a technology and engineering company in Asia, Europe, the Middle East, and the United States. The Commercial Aerospace segment provides aviation asset management services; MRO services for airframes, engines, and components; manufactures nacelles and composite floorboard; provides passenger-to-freighter and -tanker conversion services; and UAV delivery services. The Urban Solutions & Satcom segment offers smart mobility solutions, including turnkey rail, overall project management, and systems integration services, as well as various rail electronics solutions; traffic and junction management, tolling systems, back office, congestion pricing, ITS, and RFID solutions; smart utilities and infrastructure solutions, such as smart street lighting, water advanced metering infrastructure, and integrated security management solutions; urban environment solutions comprising surgical masks and cooling systems; and satellite communication solutions. The Defense & Public Security segment provides cybersecurity products, such as IP encryptors, encrypted data storage, data diodes, emergency response systems, and training and simulation solutions; defense solutions, including all terrain tracked carriers, cold-weather all-terrain vehicles, and 40mm munitions, as well as technical support and training services. The segment also provides ship building, repair, and conversion services; design and supply of platform equipment; technical assistance services; public safety and security; and critical information infrastructure solutions. It also engages in leasing of engines; running, operation, management, and supply of telecommunications services; and design, development, system integration, manufacture, and sale of satellite equipment. The company was found in 1967 and is headquartered in Singapore. Singapore Technologies Engineering Ltd is a subsidiary of Temasek Holdings (Private) Limited.
General.Address: No. 07-01, ST Engineering Hub, Singapore, Singapore, 567710
